prop_race_district %>%
ggplot(prop_race_district, mapping=aes(x=districtoccur, 
  outline = FALSE, fill = race)) + 
  geom_histogram(stat = "count") +
  ylab("Arrest Rates") +
  xlab("District") +
  geom_density(stat = "count") + 
  ggtitle("Arrest Rates by Race and Distict") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(discrete=TRUE, option="A")
